mapper.select: SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectEncryptedPwd() */ A.MEMBER_PWD FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{ id }

SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectLoginMember() */ A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.NICKNAME , A.PHONE , A.EMAIL , A.ADDRESS , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.MEMBER_ROLE , A.MEMBER_STATUS FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{ id }
mapper.update: UPDATE /* com.kh.jsp.member.model.dao#MemberDao#updateMember() */ member SET nick_name = ? , phone = ? , email = ? , address = ? WHERE status = 'Y' AND mid = ? AND member_pwd = ?
mapper.select: SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectChangedMemberInfo() */ mid , member_id , member_pwd , nick_name , phone , email , address , enroll_date , status FROM member WHERE status = 'Y' AND mid = ?
mapper.update: UPDATE /* com.greedy.jsp.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#deleteMember() */ member SET status = 'N' WHERE status = 'Y' AND mid = ? AND member_pwd = ?
